original_text: Perhaps somebody may speak to me in a language that I do not understand. Then we are like foreign people to each other.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 그 소리의 뜻을 알지 못하면 내가 말하는 자에게 외국인이 되고 말하는 자도 내게 외국인이 되리니

sentences.original_text: Perhaps somebody may speak to me
in a language that I do not understand
Then we are like foreign people
